w :  jack  have you got the book i asked you to borrow the other day ?
m :  i couldn ' t find time to go to the library .

question: why didn ' t jack get the book ?
choice: he was too busy to go to the library .
there wasn ' t such a book in the library .
he didn ' t want to borrow the book .
answer: he was too busy to go to the library .
